content: the trellis granny square is a delightful twist on the classic granny square the intricate lattice-like structure is so pleasing and offers the benefits of having smaller holes compared to the classic granny square the pattern is simple and effective and involves a 3 round repeating pattern from round 2 onwards the 3 round repeating pattern is all worked in one colour creating a satisfying stripe effect the trellis granny square is perfect for beginners and for those who want a mindless crochet project use whatever yarn you choose and the appropriate hook written pattern with video tutorial
